name: Why Am I Here?
description:
Why are you here? Good question. No time to answer as meteors seem to be falling down. Infinitely. Sucks, doesn't it? Seems to be going forever even if you die. So, last it out maybe? Lol. They're never gonna stop. Enjoy!

WASD to move around. Avoid the meteors!

Post your highscores in the comments below! Just for funsies!

Intended for the GMTK game jam 2020, but couldn't make it due to personal reasons. Decided to make a game within the same time length allotted though.

Credits:

Font - Pixelated by OmegaPC777
Music-
Sincerely by Kevin MacLeod
